segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where the real action is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are attempting a covert operation involving cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is perched precariously on a two-step stool, reaching into a "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, his whole body tense with effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost like it's about to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see one leg splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below him, hands outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together, a tiny team of confectionary thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a charming display of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risk of that stool collapsing is genuinely concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself or break the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, of course, remains completely unaware of their daring adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's fascinating how focused they are on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
